game_start.introduction:
Welcome to Vega Strike!
Use #8080FFTab#000000 to afterburn (#8080FF+,-#000000 cruise control),
#8080FFarrows#000000 to steer.
The #8080FFt#000000 key targets objects; #8080FFspace#000000 fires at them & #8080FFa#000000 activates the SPEC drive.
To go to another star system, buy a jump drive for about 10000 credits,
fly to a wireframe jump-point and press #8080FFj#000000 to warp to a near star.
Target a base or planet;
When you get close a green box will appear. Inside the box, #8080FFd#000000 will land.
